question.title: How many Oscars will Sinners win at the 2026 Academy Awards?
question.description:
On January 22, 2026, [the Academy Awards announced](https://www.oscars.org/oscars/ceremonies/2026) their nominations for the 98th ceremony awards.

*Sinners*, a 2025 American horror film, made history as reported by [Gold Derby](https://www.goldderby.com/film/2026/2026-oscar-nominations-complete-list-sinners-record/):

> ... it was the blues-loving bloodsuckers from *Sinners* that made record-shattering history, leading the field with 16 nominations for the 2026 Oscars. That surpasses the previous milestone of 14 nominations, which was jointly held by *All About Eve* (1950), *Titanic* (1997), and *La La Land* (2016).

The categories *Sinners* is nominated for included:

* Best Picture
* Best Actor in a Leading Role
* Best Actor in a Supporting Role
* Best Actress in a Supporting Role
* Best Casting
* Best Cinematography 
* Best Costume Design
* Best Directing
* Best Film Editing
* Best Makeup and Hairstyling
* Best Music (Original Score)
* Best Music (Original Song)
* Best Production Design
* Best Sound
* Best Visual Effects
* Best Writing (Original Screenplay)

If *Sinners* win 11 of their nominations, the film will set [a joint World Record for the "most Oscars won by a film"](https://www.guinnessworldrecords.com/world-records/most-oscars-won-by-a-film) (with *Ben-Hur* (1959),*Titanic* (1997) and *The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King* (2003)). If *Sinners* win more than 11 of their nominations, the film will set a outright World Record.

The 98th Academy Awards ceremony will take place on Sunday March 15, 2026, at the Dolby Theatre in Hollywood, Los Angeles, United States.

`{"format":"metac_reveal_and_close_in_period","info":{"post_id":41866,"question_id":41604}}`
question.resolution_criteria: This question will resolve as the number of awards that Sinners (2025) wins at [the 98th Academy Awards](https://www.oscars.org/).
question.fine_print:
If the 98th Academy Awards is cancelled or does not take place before May 1, 2026, this question will be annulled.

***
This question's information (resolution criteria, fine print, background info, etc) is synced with an [original identical question](https://www.metaculus.com/questions/41866) which opened on 2026-01-28 17:00:00. This question will resolve based on the resolution criteria and fine print contained above. However, if this question would resolve differently than the original question, then this question will be annulled. Additionally, if the original question's resolution could have been known before this question opened, then this question will be annulled.
